db:abstract.db:para: Enables building multi-ABI packages using the autodetected Qt for Android SDK list.

db:article.db:para: Enables building multi-ABI packages using the autodetected Qt for Android SDK list.
This variable was introduced in Qt 6.3.

db:note.db:para: This variable is in technology preview and may change in future releases.
This variable is used only if targeting the Android platform.

db:article.db:para: Automatically detects available ABIs of Qt for Android and uses them to build a package. The automatic detection expects the default directory structure supplied by the Qt installer, with the corresponding naming of the directories. The supported ABIs are armeabi-v7a, arm64-v8a, x86, x86_64. The typical directory structure looks as below:
The auto-detected paths can be customized using one of QT_PATH_ANDROID_ABI_<ABI> variables.
The variable is set to FALSE by default.
